Title: Expands eligibility for participation in the pre-licensing course internet pilot program
Summary: Expands eligibility for participation in the pre-licensing course internet pilot program; extends such provisions of law from June 30, 2025 to June 30, 2030.
LawCode: Amd ยง399-s, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to eligibility for participation in the pre-licensing course internet pilot program
